name: Operation: Indistant
description:
Survive in The Desert. You only have 3 Chances, if you fail, You fail

There Are Bandits, Raiders, Zombies and More walking around, trying to Murder you for each step YOU take.

Find the Car, Fight for survival and Win.

Controls are fairly simple:

WASD - Control Player

E- Pick up weapons

LMB - Shoot

Hold RMB - Aim

Space - Jump

CTRL/ C - Crouch

Scroll Wheel/1-9 - Weapon

This game is still updated regularly.

This is in early access, Gameplay differences might be in place

~Made with Game Guru
